content: I have an idea around restricted imports that I'd like to spec up and get opinions and ideas, but this box is a bit on the small side for it. Is there a standard way of doing that for this working-group? Should I raise a long issue in rust-secure-code/wg? (If I missed the right meta-topic for this, I do apologise)
Yes, or a blog post or something and link it from here.
Blog post would probably be best, since you can also solicit feedback on rust forums and Reddit. I find the latter preferable due to threaded conversations.
Pre-RFC on rust-internals is also a common way to do that, although lately it seems very high noise and low signal
IDK, I got a lot of mileage out of my pre-RFC on internals forum
Re: https://github.com/Eh2406/auto-fuzz-test/issues/1 Do you happen to know how to get the type of self?
I think I found it, I need visit_item_impl not visit_impl_item_method
